publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2613 Mr David Davidson: Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgowâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Bishop Mario Conti of Aberdeen on his appointment as the Archbishop of Glasgow; recognises his contribution to inter-faith co-operation in the community in Northern Scotland for over the last two decades, and wishes him success in his new role. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Russell*, Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-2613 Mr David Davidson: Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow-That the Parliament congratulates Bishop Mario Conti of Aberdeen on his appointment as the Archbishop of Glasgow; recognises his contribution to inter-faith co-operation in the community in Northern Scotland for over the last two decades, and wishes him success in his new role. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding, Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Michael Russell, Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona Hyslop*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Des McNulty*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Robert Brown*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2613 Archbishop Mario Conti of Glasgow (lodged on 16 January 2002) Bill Butler*
